page.title: 05DITTON PRIORS TRADING ESTATE
page.content: The Trading Estate used to be part of the Royal Navy Depot.It was the offices,canteen and vehicle repair shops.These buildings are now used by various firms to make many products. Here is a file of firms on the Estate. { NAME. PRODUCT. WORKERS. SET UP. Kestrel Inds. Inventions. 1. 1983. Decodex. X-Rays. 12. 1983. Mardon Co. Dust Collectors.6. 1975. Coach Builders.Car Repairs.3. 1975. Polyer Products. Resins. 8. 1970. F.L.Hitchman. Aquarolls. 4. 1973. Matt Pressing. Telecom. 9. 1974. K.G.Dckins. Engineering. 2. 1985. D.B.Sargent. Engineering. - - Leisure Service. - - - J.W.Williams. Crane Hire. - - The{advantages}of the Estate are cheap rates and rent and a rural situation. The{disadvantages}are poor roads and severe winters.
